amendment.description: Amendment sought to permit the sale of medical supplies, instruments, medical literature, and foodstuffs to Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to permit the export of staple foods and medical items to Cuba.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. McDermott.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McDermott amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 283 (Roll no. 682).
